snippet

interaction

BuiToggle

HTML Structure
<script type="text/javascript" defer src="/assets/js/module.bui.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	const toggleName = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggleName"]');
</script>

<div id="targetElementId" data-bui-toggle="toggleName">toggle target</div>
<a href="#targetElementId" data-bui-toggle-button="targetElementId" onclick="toggleName.toggle('targetElementId')">toggle button</a>
API
parameters
var toggleName = new buiToggle('selector', {
	// general
	mode: 'normal',
	event: 'click',
	activeClass: 'active',

	// focusin
	focusin: true,
	focusout: true,

	// clickout
	clickout: false,
	clickoutTarget: null,
	
	// target
	targetClass: 'bui-toggle-target',
	targetActiveClass: 'active',
	targetAttribute: 'data-toggle-target',

	// inactiveButton
	inactiveButton: false,
	inactiveButtonElement: 'button',
	inactiveButtonClass: 'close',
	inactiveButtonText: 'close',
	inactiveButtonArea: null,

	// react target
	reactTarget: null,
	reactTargetClass: null,
	reactTargetActiveClass: 'active',

	/* callback */
	onloadCallBack: function() {return false;},
	eventBeforeCallBack: function() {return false;},
	eventAfterCallBack: function() {return false;},
	activeBeforeCallBack: function() {return false;},
	activeAfterCallBack: function() {return false;},
	inactiveBeforeCallBack: function() {return false;},
	inactiveAfterCallBack: function() {return false;}
});
Methods & Properties
// toggle actions
toggleName.toggle('Toggle Target ID');

// active actions
toggleName.active('Toggle Target ID');

//  inactive actions
toggleName.inactive('Toggle Target ID');

// myToggle Properties
toggleName.myToggle['Toggle Target ID'].toggleTarget
toggleName.myToggle['Toggle Target ID'].toggleButton
toggleName.myToggle['Toggle Target ID'].reactTarget
demos
default
var toggleDefault = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggleDefault"]');
toggle button

toggle target

close
var toggleClose = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggleClose"]', {
	close: true,
	closeButtonArea: '.toggle-target-body'
});
toggle button

toggle target

clickout
var toggleClickout = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggleClickout"]', {
	close: true,
	closeButtonArea: '.toggle-target-body',
	clickout: true
});
toggle button

toggle target

focusin
var toggleFocusin = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggleFocusin"]', {
	close: true,
	closeButtonArea: '.toggle-target-body',
	focusin: true
});
toggle button

toggle target

focusout
var toggleFocusout = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggleFocusout"]', {
	close: true,
	closeButtonArea: '.toggle-target-body',
	focusout: true
});
toggle button

toggle target

reactTarget
var toggleReactTarget = new buiToggle('[data-bui-toggle="toggleReactTarget"]', {
	close: true,
	closeButtonArea: '.toggle-target-body',
	reactTarget: 'html',
	reactTargetActiveClass: 'active-toggle-react-target'
});
toggle button

toggle target

BuiTab

HTML Structure
<script type="text/javascript" defer src="/assets/js/module.bui.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" defer src="/assets/js/module.bui.template.js"></script>

<div class="tab-display" data-bui-tab="normal">
	<ul class="tab-list">
		<li class="tab-item"><a class="tab-name" href="#tabTarget1"></a></li>
		<li class="tab-item"><a class="tab-name" href="#tabTarget2"></a></li>
		<li class="tab-item"><a class="tab-name" href="#tabTarget3"></a></li>
	</ul>
</div>

<div class="tabTarget1">Tab Target 1</div>
<div class="tabTarget2">Tab Target 2</div>
<div class="tabTarget3">Tab Target 3</div>
javascript
default
var tabs = new buiTab('[data-bui-tab="normal"]');
options
var tabs = new buiTab('[data-bui-tab="normal"]'), {
	// general
	active: false,
	activeClass: 'current',
	initial: 0,

	// tab
	tabItem: '.tab-item',
	tabName: '.tab-name',
	
	// target
	target: null,
	targetClass: 'bui-tab-target',
	targetActiveClass: 'active',
});

  • two
  • three
